intro:
Cute Magical Girls, Evil Fairies and Intense Action!
Explosive combos, but Simple Controls!
description:
Use combos to beat up enemies! No complicated controls, just lots of fun with a variety of fighting moves!

Experience the joy of playing as a cute magical girl and beat up your enemies! 
A delicious and crazy action game with bright and colorful sweet action for you to sink your teeth into!

◆Game Features

1. Intense action, with easy controls!
2. Chain together combos and your attack power increases!
3. Upgradable moves and stats!
4. Explore the stages and find hidden items!
5. Switch between two different characters with distinct fighting styles!
6. Lots of end content!

◆Story

Sylphy Land, a place that exists in a different realm from the human world, is fantasy land full of mysterious creatures and ruled by the fairy queen, Miruru.

One day, something happened that turned the fairies evil! What caused the fairies to turn evil is a mystery.

Help Lime, Mint, and Puffee purify the hearts of the fairies, and restore peace to Sylphy Land!

◆Fully voiced story in Japanese by popular Japanese voice artists!

【Voice Artists】
Shiina Natsukawa, Sora Amamiya, Momo Asakura
Chiwa Saito, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka
Yuki Tamai, Yu Akiba, Satoshi Inomata, Saki Takahashi
